snippet.title: Wakerunners Official Teaser
snippet.description:
Project TB unveils its official name as Wakerunners!  Get ready for the playtest and join us during the Steam Next Fest in February!
Wakerunners is a top-down, team-based PVP action game.
Experience fast-paced combat with accelerated movement, and use characters with different skills and abilities to create synergies across different game modes.
 
More details on Wakerunners will be updated via our official channels below:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2616910
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/wakerunners
X: https://twitter.com/wakerunners
Brand page: https://mintrocketgames.com/en/wakerunners
